definition: abbr. for 非洲[Fei1 zhou1], Africa
to not be/not/wrong/incorrect/non-/un-/in-/to reproach or blame/(colloquial) to insist on/simply must
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: HF radar backscatter from the ocean surface shows nonlinearities and time variation of its spectrum.
sentences.chinese: 高频波段海洋回波信号表现了非线性和频谱时变性。

sentences.english: It is point out that the fluctuation of structure function lead to nonlinear scaling law.
sentences.chinese: 指出结构函数的振荡涨落导致非线性标度律。

sentences.english: Optimality Conditions for a Class of Generalized Semi-infinite Programming;
sentences.chinese: 并给出了非线性半定规划的最优性必要和充分条件。

sentences.english: A nonlinear steam valve controller is designed by using the proposed method.
sentences.chinese: 应用该方法设计了发电机主汽门非线性鲁棒控制器。

sentences.english: This phenomenon appears even more striking in the simulation realization of non-linear negative impedance.
sentences.chinese: 这在非线性负阻抗的模拟实现中，更为突出。

sentences.english: Studies the initial boundary value problem of a new nonlinear evolution equation.
sentences.chinese: 研究了一类非线性方程的初边值问题。

sentences.english: Weighted geometric means combination forecasting is a kind of nonlinear combination forecasting method.
sentences.chinese: 加权几何平均组合预测为一种非线性的组合预测方法。

sentences.english: The nonlinear effects of curvature of wellbore on the side forces on bit are shown by the compu…
sentences.chinese: 计算表明了井眼曲率对钻头侧向力的非线性效应。

sentences.english: Non-Linear Least Squares were used to estimate the exponential time model.
sentences.chinese: 非线性最小二乘法用于估算指数时间模型。

sentences.english: Nonlinear optical(NLO) materials will play a key role in future optical communication.
sentences.chinese: 非线性光学材料是未来光通讯的关键材料。

sentences.english: TCM Syndrome is a non-linear system of complex giant system.
sentences.chinese: 中医证候体系是一个非线性的复杂巨系统。

sentences.english: The evolution of nonlinearities of vibrations of the shells is extensively investigated.
sentences.chinese: 这使此种壳体的非线性振动的进展获得扩充研究。

sentences.english: We give a quasi-Newton algorithm with nonmonotonic trust region methods for nonlinear equations.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一类解非线性方程的非单调信赖域的牛顿算法。

sentences.english: We consider the nonlinearly constrained tolerance allocation problems.
sentences.chinese: 我们考虑非线性约束的公差分配问题。

sentences.english: Multi-layer feedback BP network is a non-linear dynamic system.
sentences.chinese: 多层反馈BP网络是一种非线性动力学系统。

sentences.english: The non-Linear increasing of the value is a great resource of profits.
sentences.chinese: 价值的非线性增长是利润的一大来源。
